# @paprika/panels - 1.0.0

## Description

The Panels component provides a view that slides in from one side so the user can maintain context of their main task while they work on a sub task.

## Installation

```
yarn add @paprika/panels
```

or with npm:

```
npm install @paprika/panels
```

## Props

### Panels

| Prop                  | Type                                                                             | required | default                   | Description                                                                     |
| --------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| a11yText              | string                                                                           | false    | null                      |                                                                                 |
| children              | node                                                                             | true     | -                         | The content for the Panels.                                                     |
| getPushContentElement | func                                                                             | false    | null                      | Function that provides the container DOM element to be pushed.                  |
| groupOffsetY          | number                                                                           | false    | 0                         | Y offset that is passed down from <Panels.Group>                                |
| isCompact             | bool                                                                             | false    | false                     | Control the compactness of the side panel                                       |
| isInline              | bool                                                                             | false    | false                     | Render the panels inline                                                        |
| isOpen                | bool                                                                             | true     | -                         | Control the visibility of the side panel. This prop makes the side panel appear |
| isSlideFromLeft       | bool                                                                             | false    | false                     | Control if the side panel slides from the left                                  |
| kind                  | [ Panels.types.kind.DEFAULT, Panels.types.kind.CHILD, Panels.types.kind.PRIMARY] | false    | Panels.types.kind.DEFAULT | Modify the look of the Panels                                                   |
| offsetY               | number                                                                           | false    | 0                         | Control y offset of the panels                                                  |
| onAfterClose          | func                                                                             | false    | () => {}                  | Callback once the panels has been closed event                                  |
| onAfterOpen           | func                                                                             | false    | () => {}                  | Callback once the panels has been opened event                                  |
| onClose               | func                                                                             | false    | null                      | Callback triggered when the side panel needs to be close                        |
| width                 | [string,number]                                                                  | false    | "33%"                     | The width of the open panel.                                                    |
| zIndex                | number                                                                           | false    | zValue(7)                 | Control the z position of the panels                                            |

<!-- autogenerated don't modify -->
<!-- content -->

## Components

You can use any of the following components to compose the Panels:

```js
<Panels.Header />
<Panels.Footer />
<Panels.Overlay />
<Panels.FocusLock />
<Panels.Trigger />
```

## Basic examples.

```js
<Panels isOpen={isOpen} onClose={() => {}}>
  [...your_content...]
</Panels>
```

```js
<Panels isOpen={isOpen} onClose={() => {}}>
  <Panels.Header>Your header</Panels.Header>
  [...your_content...]
  <Panels.Overlay />
</Panels>
```

## Warnings

If the content you are putting into this component will try and control focus (like CKEditor), read this: https://github.com/acl-services/paprika/issues/453
